_header: Hail be thou Mary mother and may / Mild and meek and merciable
_description: ‘A Salutacioun to vre lady’ — eleven 12-line stanzas (abababababab) with refrain, ‘Þou preye for vs to þi sone so fre Aue’

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Heil beo þow Marie Modur and MayMylde and Meke and
                    Merciable…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Þauh synnes haue vs þorwh souhtBring vs to þi
                    blis þat euer schal be. Amen. Aue
